text: Scirpophaga terrella is a moth in the family Crambidae. It is found in Paraná, Brazil. The wingspan is about 34 mm. The wings are dull yellowish brown, irrorated (speckled) with fuscous.Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London 1895: 914 ==References== Category:Moths described in 1896 Category:Schoenobiinae Category:Moths of Brazil
title: Scirpophaga terrella
